text: Tāmen qǐng nǐ [mù shèng] zhìdìng fùnǚ de lǜ lì. Nǐ [duì tāmen] shuō: Ān lā jiāng wèi nǐmen zhìdìng yǒuguān tāmen de lǜ lì, běn jīngdiǎn [“gǔlánjīng”] zhōng xiàng nǐmen suǒ xuāndúguò de jīng wén, yǒu guānyú nǐmen bù yuàn bǎ gū nǚ [zhù] yīng dé de cáiwù [pìnjīn hé yíchǎn] jiāo gěi tāmen, ér nǐmen yòu xiǎng qǔ tāmen [de lǜ lì], yǒu guānyú shòu qīyā de értóng [de lǜ lì], yǒu guānyú nǐmen yīng gōngpíng duìdài gū'ér [de lǜ lì]. Fánshì nǐmen suǒ zuò de shàngōng, ān lā què shì quánzhī de.
